
## Installation 

```bash
git clone https://gitlab.com/simon.grah/spark_optimization.git
pip install .
```

## Dataset sources
* [Meteo Dataset](https://public.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/donnees-synop-essentielles-omm/table/?sort=date&&location=3,17.30869,2.63672&basemap=jawg.streets)
* [Insee Dataset](https://www.data.gouv.fr/fr/datasets/data-insee-sur-les-communes/)
